title: listAuthMethods
description: Overview of the listAuthMethods method
slug: wallets/reference/account-kit/signer/classes/BaseAlchemySigner/listAuthMethods
---

Retrieves a list of auth methods associated with the authenticated user.

## Import

```ts
import { BaseAlchemySigner } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Returns

`Promise<AuthMethods>`
A promise that resolves to an `AuthMethods` object containing the user's email, OAuth providers, and passkeys.
